tool_description: An open API for group chat functionality, allowing users to send and receive messages in a group setting.

api_list.name: Dapat Pesan
api_list.description: API to retrieve messages from the group chat.

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: The API key required for authentication.

api_list.name: Kirim Pesan
api_list.description: API to send messages to the group chat.

required_parameters.name: pesan
required_parameters.description: The message content to be sent.

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: The API key required for authentication.
